TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Alignment extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 指定呈现的对象的对齐方式。

span.span: Specifies the alignment of a rendered object.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举表示其父容器，如面板或窗体上的项的水平定位。The enumeration represents the horizontal positioning of an item on its parent container, such as a panel or form. 例如，如果将映像添加到窗体中，你可以设置其水平的位置，以与窗体的右侧对齐。For example, if you add an image to a form, you can set its horizontal position to align with the right side of the form. 你可以在脚本语言中使用的位值，但你不能与 ASP.NET 结合使用它们。Although you can use the bit values in scripting languages, you cannot use them with ASP.NET. 例如，`Alignment = "2"`面板中标记不是有效的语句。For example, `Alignment = "2"` within a panel tag is not a valid statement. 但是，在 Visual C# 中，你可以使用`this.myPanel.Alignment = 2`。However, in Visual C#, you can use `this.myPanel.Alignment = 2`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Alignment NotSet = int32(0)

summary.span: 如果值为 ，则对齐方式从控件样式继承；或者，如果未定义样式，则从控件的父控件继承。

span.span: If the value is , then the alignment is inherited from the control's style, or, if the style is not defined, from the control's parent control.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。
